CustomField.formula: CASE( TEXT(Issue_KPI__c) , 'Buyback - Cancellation (Functional) rate','Buyback - Cancellation rate', 'Buyback - Counter-Proposal (Functional) rate', 'Buyback - Counter-Proposal rate', 'Buyback - Counter-Proposal (Non Functional) rate', 'Buyback - Counter-Proposal rate', 'Buyback - Pending Order rate', 'Buyback - On-hold rate', TEXT(Issue_KPI__c) )
CustomField.label: Issue KPI old and new
